segments.text: Good afternoon , Felix Wassermann Associates . Lawson speaking , how can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , this is Miao Eng calling from Lincoln Bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: B :: Miao Eng ! I'd know that voice anywhere . What can I do for you ? Any problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not at all . I was just calling to tell you that everything has been checked and double checked , and there is no problem with the documents you brought in this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall I go ahead and process them for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perfect . Thanks very much for calling . See you soon , bye !
segments.speaker: S1
